Only long enough to want to poke my eyes out!
translation.ko: 아주 잠깐 봤지만 안 본 눈 사고 싶다

translation.en: What happened to, "I'm done with all of that?" Well, I'm a person, Peter, I'm not a rock.
translation.ko: - 그럴 일 없다더니 - 난 돌이 아니라 사람이거든

translation.en: That's literally what you said! "My heart is a cold, hard stone."
translation.ko: 뭐? 본인 입으로 뭐랬어? '내 마음은 차갑고 딱딱한 돌이야'

translation.en: Okay, okay, well-- And you talking about somebody's personal life?
translation.ko: 그래, 지금 사람 사생활 갖고 이럴 거야?

translation.en: Oh, okay. Here we go.
I gave you my kid.
He is my whole life!
Which is maybe a problem.
I cannot believe you.
You know what?
You always said you were a piece of shit. Well, maybe you were right!
translation.ko: 네 입으로 맨날 쓰레기랬지? 맞는 말인 거 같네

translation.en: -That was really fucking mean. -Okay, well, you--
translation.ko: - 와, 진짜 더럽게 못됐네 - 뭐? 너는?

translation.en: What? I dropped my life to come help you? Is that what I did wrong?
translation.ko: - 응? - 내 생활 포기하고 도와주러 왔지

translation.en: You're unbelievable! Unbelievable!
translation.ko: - 그게 잘못이야? - 진짜 기가 찬다, 기가 차

translation.en: Oh, shit!
Wait! Wait, don't… Hold on a second.
-I'm so mad at-- -What the hell is wrong with you?
translation.ko: - 나 진짜 화났… - 너 도대체 뭐야?

translation.en: -You went through my things? -Why didn't you tell me?
translation.ko: - 내 물건 뒤졌어? - 왜 말 안 했어?

translation.en: [voice breaks] Why didn't you say anything? Why did you let so much time go by?
translation.ko: 왜 아무 말도 안 했어? 왜 그렇게 시간을 흘려보냈어?

translation.en: -Be-- Because I was scared! -Scared of what?
-Scared that I'm not good enough for you! -Oh!
Scared that you're gonna reject me if I tell you how I feel.
translation.ko: 내 감정을 말해도 거절당할까 봐 두려웠다고

translation.en: Well, just tell me how you feel!
You know how I feel!
Wait, what? That, what, you're in love with me or something? No!
Debbie, I am madly, deeply, overwhelmingly in love with you.
translation.ko: 데비, 나 널 심하게 깊이 불가항력적으로 사랑해

translation.en: And I have been since the moment I met you.
Well, you could have said something. We talk every day.
translation.ko: 무슨 말이라도 하지 그랬어? 매일 통화하는 사이에

translation.en: Well, now what are we gonna do? I thought we were gonna be friends forever.
translation.ko: 이제 우리 어떡해? 난 영원히 친구로 남을 줄 알았어

translation.en: -We're not? -No.
We're not gonna be friends anymore, Debbie.
-So you're gonna be a published author! -[Peter] That's-- Yeah.
translation.ko: - 너 이제 출판 작가야 - 그래, 그렇네

translation.en: And you're gonna be a fancy editor.
-[Debbie] So weird. [laughs] -Big time.
translation.ko: "고작 15분쯤 후" 기분 진짜 묘하다 빨리 잭을 보고 싶어

translation.en: -Can't wait to see Jack. -Oh, my God. He's gonna freak out.
translation.ko: 기분 진짜 묘하다 빨리 잭을 보고 싶어 - 들으면 좋아서 환장할걸? - 잠깐

translation.en: -He's gonna be so excited. -Wait a second.
Are we gonna be hand-holders?
translation.ko: 우리 손 잡는 커플 할 거야?

translation.en: -I've never seen you hold a human's hand. -I don't hold hands!
translation.ko: - 너 누구 손 잡는 거 처음 봐 - 원래 손 같은 거 안 잡아

translation.en: Yeah!
-But it-- it feels kind of… good. -What about this one?
translation.ko: - 근데 잡으니까 기분 좀 좋긴 해 - 그렇다면 이건 어때?

translation.en: -Yeah. I think we're hand-holders. -Mmm!
translation.ko: 좋네, 우리 손 잡는 커플 하자

translation.en: -Oh! Look at us. -I think we are.
Okay, there he is. That's our Uber. All right. [sighs]
translation.ko: 저기 오네, 우리 우버 택시, 됐어

translation.en: So, what happens next?
♪ To hang around with you ♪
♪ And maybe you think I'm lucky ♪
♪ To have something to do ♪
♪ But I think that you're wild ♪
translation.ko: "계단 10억 개 오르락내리락하며 나른 이삿짐 (이것도 피터)" "어느 독립 출판사 편집자로 취업 (데비)"

translation.en: ♪ Inside me is some child ♪
♪ You might think I'm foolish ♪
♪ You might think I'm crazy ♪ ♪ All I want ♪
♪ All I want is you ♪
translation.ko: "그 후로 오래오래 행복하게 살았다고 한다" "농담이다, 결혼생활은 빡세거든"

translation.en: ♪ Ooh, ooh ♪
♪ All I want is you ♪
translation.ko: "농담이다, 결혼생활은 빡세거든" "하지만 그래도 잘 살았다고 한다"

translation.en: -♪ All I want is you ♪ -♪ All I want is you ♪
♪ We were embers ♪
